conclusion: The problem involves determining the internal resistance of a silicon photocell based on a given U-I graph.
Line a shows the U-I relationship of the battery under a certain light intensity, intersecting the U-axis at 5 V and the I-axis at 0.4 A.
Line b shows the U-I relationship of a resistance R, with a slope of 12 立.
The open circuit voltage (Voc) is 5 V.
The short circuit current (Isc) is 0.4 A.
The internal resistance (r) is calculated as 0.5 立.
The internal resistance of the silicon photocell is 0.5 立.
